statements: SELECT * FROM pos_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM pos_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM pos_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM pos_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM pos_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM pos_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM pos_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS largest_transaction FROM pos_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1002;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM pos_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM pos_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE pos_terminal_id = '1a2b3c4d5e' AND transaction_amount < 5000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, terminal_location FROM transactions INNER JOIN pos_terminals ON transactions.pos_terminal_id = pos_terminals.pos_terminal_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT pos_terminal_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY pos_terminal_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, terminal_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM terminals WHERE software_version = 'v2.0';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.customer_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT terminal_name, location FROM terminals WHERE software_version='v2.0' ORDER BY terminal_name ASC;
SELECT terminal_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY terminal_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pos_terminal;
SELECT terminal_name, location FROM pos_terminal ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transaction WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT sync_id, last_sync_date, status FROM synchronization;
SELECT * FROM pos_terminal WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT terminal_name, location FROM pos_terminal JOIN transaction ON pos_terminal.id = transaction.terminal_id;
SELECT sync_id, last_sync_date, status FROM synchronization WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY last_sync_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM pos_terminal;
SELECT terminal_name, location FROM pos_terminal ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM pos_terminal ORDER BY terminal_name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.timestamp, pt.quantity FROM transactions t INNER JOIN product_transactions pt ON t.transaction_id = pt.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;

SELECT p.product_name, t.amount, t.timestamp, pt.quantity FROM transactions t INNER JOIN product_transactions pt ON t.transaction_id = pt.transaction_id INNER JOIN inventory p ON pt.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
